price: 8. Nini? Ezali nde ye oyo bakitiseli ye bokundoli kati kati na biso? Bazali na tembe тропа bokundoli bwa ngai, kala te, bakomekaka etumbu na ngai.
arabic: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّن ذِكۡرِيۚ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: a-unzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru min bayninā bal hum fī shakkin min dhik'rī bal lammā yadhūqū ʿadhābi
